name: Pingoal
description:
Have you played PinGoal today?

After many requests the classic game that made history on iOS back in 2009 is now back for it's 10th anniversary! 

Play with friends like it used to be in the good ol' days of couch multiplayer. 

Do you think that you need training to beat any challenge? PinGoal has an exclusive bot to help you be a master "pingoaler" on-the-go. 

This is the 10 years commemorative edition of PinGoal. The second released game made by Granada Studio (creators of _M_, M3T4, Upsolom, Imanente, Errante) that first appeared on iOS and now you can play on your Android device, fully remodeled in full 3D giving a better experience to the player.

Great emotions awaits you and your friends while playing this amazing game!

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls; 

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
